author: George Williams
comment: I LOVE your work. Your faces are amazing and elegant. I have to say that this face is far too tiny on the LG G Watch. I can barely read it. I know you mainly do round faces. That doesn't make your work any less. You are by far one of the best. I just wish you would extend out to more square faces. If you'd be so kind to edit this from a round inside a square face to a true square face it would be much appreciated. Keep up the great work. You're a true artist!

reply.author: Frank Dufaux Mindlabs
reply.content: thank you i'm working on this change should be available shortly in a true square version i might acknowledge that i've been lazy porting it to square but it will be corrected Thank you again for the input.

title: 5 for your work.

author: Abhimanyu Singh Chauhan
comment: Really love ur work man. Amazing just make the small Number Markers Square too. Thanks dude
title: Great Work

author: ashwin kiran
comment: Not able to see on my watch
title: Not able to see on my moto 360 sport

comment: Thanks for giving the square heads some love. Looks really good
title: Cool watch face

comment: Looks nice shall give it a whirl
